level.heading: Regulations.
level.text: The Chief Financial Officer may promulgate regulations to carry out the purpose of this chapter and amend or repeal any existing regulations promulgated to carry out the purpose of this chapter.

level.heading: Temporary Amendment of Section
level.text: For temporary (225 day) amendment of section, see § 2(h) of Real Property Tax Assessment Transition Temporary Act of 2001 (D.C. Law 14-23, September 6, 2001, law notification 48 DCR 9093).

level.heading: Emergency Legislation
level.text: For temporary (90 day) amendment of section, see § 2(h) of Real Property Tax Assessment Transition Emergency Act of 2001 (D.C. Act 14-44, April 18, 2001, 48 DCR 3844).
For temporary (90 day) amendment of section, see § 2(h) of Real Property Tax Assessment Transition Congressional Review Emergency Act of 2001 (D.C. Act 14-116, August 3, 2001, 48 DCR 7659).

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 8-180
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 8-180, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-871.
